attributes.additional_details:
The ulez is only effecting the poor people, with this extra outgoing, it's making the already high cost of living even harder.

By charging the poor people a fee to get around to work, shopping, and everyday life, it's becoming very clear that the goal is to keep poor people poor, and make life easier for the wealthy.

It's poor persons tax and to think, these people built the places you now want to charge them drive in.
attributes.background:
Take down the ulez operation, instead of charging the poor people, making them worse off, relook at making life more convenient for them.
After all, these people built these big cities!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Ultra Low Emission Zones are the responsibility of local authorities and councils.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You may also wish to sign this petition:

Remove local authority powers to introduce LTNs, CAZs, LEZs and ULEZs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637517
